<div id="guidelines_content" class="guidelines_content_lightbox" style="display:none;">
<p class="headline">Booking.com Guest Review Guidelines</p>
<i>To keep the rating score and review content relevant for your upcoming trip, we archive reviews older than 24 months.</i>
<p>Only a customer who has booked through Booking.com and stayed at the property in question can write a review. This allows us to verify that our reviews come from real guests like you. Who better to tell others about the free breakfast, friendly staff, or their comfortable room than someone who’s stayed at the property?</p>
<p>We want you to share your story, with both the good and the not-so-good. All we ask is that you follow a few simple guidelines.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Reviews Vision</strong></p>
<p>We believe review contributions and property responses will highlight a wide range of opinions and experiences, which is critical in helping guests make informed decisions about where to stay.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Reviews Principles</strong></p>
<p>Contributions to Booking.com are a reflection of the dedication of our guests and properties, so we treat them with the utmost respect.</p>
<p>Whether negative or positive, we'll post every comment in full and as quickly as possible, provided the guidelines are met. We'll also provide transparency over the status of submitted content.</p>
<p>We'll use the same guidelines and standards for all user-generated content, and for the property responses to that content.</p>
<p>We'll allow the contributions to speak for themselves, and we won’t be the judge of reality. Booking.com’s role is to be a feedback distributor for both guests and properties.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Guidelines and Standards for Reviews</strong></p>
<p>These guidelines and standards aim to keep the content on Booking.com relevant and family-friendly, without limiting expression or strong opinions. They're also applicable regardless of the comment's tone. </p>
<p><strong>Contributions should be travel related.</strong> The most helpful contributions are detailed and help others make better decisions. Please don’t include personal, political, ethical, or religious commentary. Promotional content will be removed and issues concerning Booking.com’s services should be routed to our Customer Service or Accommodation Service teams.</p>
<p><strong>Contributions should be appropriate for a global audience.</strong> Please avoid using profanity or attempts to approximate profanity with creative spelling, in any language. Comments and media that include hate speech, discriminatory remarks, threats, sexually explicit remarks, violence, or the promotion of illegal activity are not permitted. </p>
<p><strong>All content should be genuine and unique to the guest.</strong> Reviews are most valuable when they are original and unbiased. Your contribution should be yours. Booking.com property partners should not post on behalf of guests or offer incentives in exchange for reviews. Attempts to bring down the rating of a competitor by submitting a negative review will not be tolerated.</p>
<p><strong>Respect the privacy of others.</strong> Booking.com will make an effort to obscure email addresses, telephone numbers, website addresses, social media accounts, and other similar details.</p>
<p><strong>The opinions expressed in contributions are those of Booking.com customers and properties, and not of Booking.com. Booking.com does not accept responsibility or liability for any reviews or responses. Booking.com is a distributor (without any obligation to verify) and not a publisher of these comments and responses.</strong></p>
</div>

<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">Firstly, the accommodation states on-site parking.  There were two parking spaces, one of which appeared to be taken up by a vehicle that did not belong to a visitor.  There is on street parking nearby but to advertise that the property has its own parking is stretching a point.Secondly, the room was not double glazed and, as the hotel is on a main road, it was noisy.Thirdly, having booked in and then returning to my room later I found that there was a leak from the room upstairs. This was investigated and rectified but with no real sense of urgency or apology (although I did eventually get an explanation), the water was not cleaned up, I wasn't offered an alternative room (without an internal waterfall feature) or any compensation for my belongings that were wet through!!</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">Good location if a little noisy.</span></p>

<div class="review_item_review_content">
<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">II thought I had booked a hotel that had a bar and restaurant so was very surprised to arrive at a pub with rooms above. I hoped for the best and assumed there would be good soundproofing between the bar and bedrooms but there was not. This was a problem as the music played very loudly until 2am - both nights - and it was almost 3am before the party people had vacated the disco and finished yelling their goodbyes to each other under my single-glazed window. I had to be up early each morning and had booked 2 night's stay so I could be refreshed and relaxed to attend the conference.  The music was so loud it was impossible to sleep leaving me so tired the whole experience was spoiled,</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">The staff at the Dalesway are friendly and the pub welcomes dogs. The location is excellent, and the room was fine with a comfortable bed.Staff agreed to serve me at 8.30 (breakfast serving due to start at 9am). I thought the arrangement was for both mornings but in the event it was only Saturday and I had to wait until the official start on Sunday. The breakfast was well cooked but choice was restricted.</span></p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="review_item_review_content">
<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">The twin room was cramp, tired looking and looked dark and unclean,it smelt of dog. The bathroom was tired looking and clean but the smell of the drainage was quite overwhelming. The toilet flush actually sounded like 'the Isle of Man Ferry fog horn' The beds was shabby with old bed linen which had pulls and snags in the duvet cover. The sheets where winter white. The bed mattress was stained and smelled old. The electric socket by the bed became warm after the lamp was switched on for 10minutes. we felt it was unsafe so only had the main electric light on.We were unable to actually complain on the day as we were under time pressure because we were attending a wedding. We left the wedding earlier than planned in order to leave the hotel and go home that night, so strong was our concern about the room. I was unable to actually speak with the Landlord that evening as he was unavailable.Today I have spoken with the Landlord and have expressed my concerns. He has in fact offered use a return trip to Ilkley at his expense but it is an area of the country we do not visit, and so we have turned down his kind gesture. He also assures me that he will personally look into our concerns.</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">The location</span></p>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

content: part of The Priceline Group $ Loading Choose your preferred language. We speak English (US) and 42 other languages. Most often used by people in the United States English (US) English (UK) Español 简体中文 한국어 Français All languages English (UK) English (US) Deutsch Nederlands Français Español Español (AR) Català Italiano Português (PT) Português (BR) Norsk Suomi Svenska Dansk Čeština Magyar Română 日本語 简体中文 繁體中文 Polski Ελληνικά Русский Türkçe Български العربية 한국어 עברית Latviski Українська Bahasa Indonesia Bahasa Malaysia ภาษาไทย Eesti Hrvatski Lietuvių Slovenčina Srpski Slovenščina Tiếng Việt Filipino Íslenska Invite & Earn List Your Property Register Sign in Accommodations Hotel reviews homepage → UK hotel reviews → West Yorkshire hotel reviews → Ilkley hotel reviews → Reviews of Dalesway Hotel Reviews of Dalesway Hotel 1 Leeds Road, Ilkley, LS29 8DH, United Kingdom #7 of 8 hotels in Ilkley Guests' Choice See the hotel Languages: All languages Danish Dutch English French Italian Romanian Traveler type: All travelers Business travelers Couples Families Groups of friends Solo travelers Sort by: Date (older to newer) Date (newer to older) Featured reviews Score (lower to higher) Score (higher to lower) Review Score Based on 287 hotel reviews 8.0 Score breakdown Cleanliness 7.6 Comfort 7.7 Location 8.8 Facilities 7.5 Staff 8.8 Value for money 7.5 Free WiFi 7.7 눱 100% Verified Reviews Real guests. Real stays. Real opinions. Read more Write a Review Booking.com Guest Review Guidelines To keep the rating score and review content relevant for your upcoming trip, we archive reviews older than 24 months. Only a customer who has booked through Booking.com and stayed at the property in question can write a review. This allows us to verify that our reviews come from real guests like you. Who better to tell others about the free breakfast, friendly staff, or their comfortable room than someone who’s stayed at the property? We want you to share your story, with both the good and the not-so-good. All we ask is that you follow a few simple guidelines. Reviews Vision We believe review contributions and property responses will highlight a wide range of opinions and experiences, which is critical in helping guests make informed decisions about where to stay. Reviews Principles Contributions to Booking.com are a reflection of the dedication of our guests and properties, so we treat them with the utmost respect. Whether negative or positive, we'll post every comment in full and as quickly as possible, provided the guidelines are met. We'll also provide transparency over the status of submitted content. We'll use the same guidelines and standards for all user-generated content, and for the property responses to that content. We'll allow the contributions to speak for themselves, and we won’t be the judge of reality. Booking.com’s role is to be a feedback distributor for both guests and properties. Guidelines and Standards for Reviews These guidelines and standards aim to keep the content on Booking.com relevant and family-friendly, without limiting expression or strong opinions. They're also applicable regardless of the comment's tone. Contributions should be travel related. The most helpful contributions are detailed and help others make better decisions. Please don’t include personal, political, ethical, or religious commentary. Promotional content will be removed and issues concerning Booking.com’s services should be routed to our Customer Service or Accommodation Service teams. Contributions should be appropriate for a global audience. Please avoid using profanity or attempts to approximate profanity with creative spelling, in any language. Comments and media that include hate speech, discriminatory remarks, threats, sexually explicit remarks, violence, or the promotion of illegal activity are not permitted. All content should be genuine and unique to the guest. Reviews are most valuable when they are original and unbiased. Your contribution should be yours. Booking.com property partners should not post on behalf of guests or offer incentives in exchange for reviews. Attempts to bring down the rating of a competitor by submitting a negative review will not be tolerated. Respect the privacy of others. Booking.com will make an effort to obscure email addresses, telephone numbers, website addresses, social media accounts, and other similar details. The opinions expressed in contributions are those of Booking.com customers and properties, and not of Booking.com. Booking.com does not accept responsibility or liability for any reviews or responses. Booking.com is a distributor (without any obligation to verify) and not a publisher of these comments and responses. Next page Showing 1 - 75 November 15, 2017 Alan United Kingdom 1 review 6.3 “ Stay cut short due to inability to sleep. Staff were very understanding and helpful ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Bed matress was old and uncomfortable. The noise from outside was intolerable. Noisy was like windows fully open 눇 Meals in the pub were excellent quality and value for money November 10, 2017 Janet United Kingdom 3 Reviews 5.0 “ Not designer as stated. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 No parking and had to leave car on the street. Room clean but dated. Bathroom very dated,very small and evidence of mould. Noisy due to party but we were aware of this. Also expensive for a night. Four star in Newcastle only cost £5 more. 눇 Very close to venue for anniversary party so could walk. Breakfast was very nice but not included in price. October 27, 2017 Anonymous United Kingdom 1 review 5.0 “ Good location if a little noisy. ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Superior Double Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 Firstly, the accommodation states on-site parking. There were two parking spaces, one of which appeared to be taken up by a vehicle that did not belong to a visitor. There is on street parking nearby but to advertise that the property has its own parking is stretching a point. Secondly, the room was not double glazed and, as the hotel is on a main road, it was noisy. Thirdly, having booked in and then returning to my room later I found that there was a leak from the room upstairs. This was investigated and rectified but with no real sense of urgency or apology (although I did eventually get an explanation), the water was not cleaned up, I wasn't offered an alternative room (without an internal waterfall feature) or any compensation for my belongings that were wet through!! 눇 Good location if a little noisy. October 27, 2017 Paul United Kingdom 15 Reviews 9.6 “ Cosy place in a lovely town ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The car parking area is very small so may not be an option; we parked a few minutes away for free. Not a problem for us at all 눇 Centrally located in Ilkley, so handy for everything. Room in eves of building fantastic, and spacious with a walk in wardrobe. Special mention to the menu where filled Yorkshire Puddings are the specialty; there was so much choice of fillings and huge portions too. October 21, 2017 Jeffrey United Kingdom 7 Reviews 10 “ Fantastic Hotel ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Nothing, This hotel was comfortable and perfect. 눇 Freindly staff. Great place to eat and relax. Very clean and comfortable. Will definitely be back soon. October 19, 2017 Graeme United Kingdom Age group: 25 – 34 14 Reviews 8.8 “ would stay again ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 breakfast a little earlier than 0830 would be great, as it made it tighter than I'd have liked getting to a 9am meeting 눇 nicely presented room, with sofa, tea/ coffee, etc. October 13, 2017 Christine United Kingdom 4 Reviews 8.3 “ Very present. Had breakfast at Hotel, lovely and hot ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Windows were all painted shut, so couldn't get any air into room 눇 Superior double was lovely & big, had comfortable settee in room. Staff were all very nice and helpful. September 26, 2017 Daleslady United Kingdom 1 review 6.7 “ Cheap, cheerful and friendly place for an overnight stop. ” • Leisure trip • Group • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 Badly finished plumbing left us with no hot water at the sink and a flooded shower tray. Could do with new mattresses (rather soft and springy) and better quality pillows. Shower room very small, had to maneouvre round the door to get in. 눇 Central location. Clean, large bedroom. Recently refurbished shower room. Friendly and helpful staff. September 21, 2017 Louise United Kingdom 2 Reviews 5.0 “ Location in ilkley, staff very friendly and helpful ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Room very dated and bathroom in poor state of repair. Room not very clean, en suite damp with mould patches, shower in particular needed replacing 눇 Location in ilkley, staff very friendly and helpful September 14, 2017 Emma United Kingdom 1 review 8.8 “ very nice and enjoyable with friendly staff and lovely room ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Parking over the road as we had so much stuff for our little girl. Also all the stairs for the same reason. It was two trips up and down and to the car. 눇 Very Friendly staff. Amazing size room and facilities. Just overall a very nice place to be. September 10, 2017 Steven United Kingdom 2 Reviews 9.6 “ We have been ilkley 5 times love the area and the people hotel spotless, frI endless so central for ” • Leisure trip • Group • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The restaurant times 눇 Sunday lunch was excellent, it said serving till 9am at night but it did not it was only till 7 pm that was the only draw back as we were would have eaten there instead of elsewhere September 4, 2017 Christopher United Kingdom 6 Reviews 6.7 “ Adequate but would probably not return to this hotel. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 3 nights 눉 The drains from the sink and bath smelled. The carpets looked (and smelled) as if they needed a good shampoo. Car parking was off site in the church's car park across the road. There was no room at all in what was described as the patrons car park as this was taken up with a food van, a car covered by a tarpaulin and one other car. 눇 The breakfast and service was excellent. The staff were friendly and helpful. The prices were reasonable. September 1, 2017 D United Kingdom 2 Reviews 5.4 “ As a place to lay our heads it was convenient, but not very welcoming. ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Slightly unpleasant smell, black mould in the shower, including all over the shower head. Loud scrapping noise seemingly from inside walls suggested rodent activity especially at night. Staff completely ignored us when we came in past the them behind the bar to go to our room the second night. 눇 Room was very spacious, iron and ironing board, plenty of hanging space in a separate dressing room area. Young man who showed us to our room was friendly and helpful. Bed very comfortable, bed room very clean. August 23, 2017 Guy United Kingdom 10 Reviews 8.8 “ Great hospitality at The Dalesway....we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 Great welcome and everyone friendly. Our room was spacious and comfortable....also very quiet which was a surprise given the central location of the hotel and it's busy bar. Breakfast was freshly cooked to order and great value. This hotel is in a great position in the centre of Ilkley.....great shops, restaurants and many attractions within walking distance. I don't expect the owners would claim their hotel to be in the luxury category however, it met our needs and we would happily recommend it to anyone seeking a decent hotel in the centre of this lovely town. August 2, 2017 AnneDanny United Kingdom 6 Reviews 6.7 “ Relatively cheap n cheerful ” • Leisure trip • Group • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Basic breakfast, fry up and toast. Stair well smell chip fat and rooms could do with a face lift 눇 Great location very central position. Parking opposite was free - we were lucky to get a space though. July 26, 2017 Jennifer Canada 2 Reviews 9.6 “ We loved our stay at the Dalesway ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 The Dalesway was a great spot to stay for our family of four. We booked one night but ended up staying three. The rooms were large and comfortable, the staff were friendly and welcoming. Breakfast was delicious and there is a lot to do around the town and neighbouring towns. July 12, 2017 Ken United Kingdom 7 Reviews 4.6 “ Very disappointing from the review we got from Bookings ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 No food after 6.30 p.m. Facilities not up to modern day acceptable standard Food cooking smell throughout hotel Toilet see not correct size for this toilet 눇 Local area very nice June 6, 2017 David United Kingdom 9 Reviews 7.5 “ A satisfactory stay ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night 눉 Our particular room overlooked a busy road so quite a lot of traffic noise. Mattress was rather soft and uncomfortable. Breakfast was disappointing and it isn't surprising we were the only residents who appeared to be having breakfast. The evening meal was also a little disappointing. 눇 The location in the centre of Ilkley very close to the railway station was excellent. Staff were very helpful. June 5, 2017 Louise United Kingdom 1 review 3.3 “ Dissapointed hotel ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 There was no where to park. The room was well over priced it was cold and dirty the shower did not work well. The light above mirror did not work. There was paint on the carpet and all over the very old leather couch that was in the room. It was very unclean. There is just to much to complain about would not stay at this property again. Very dissapointed 눇 The breakfast was not bad but you did not have much of a choice to choose from. June 2, 2017 Lindsay United Kingdom 1 review 10 “ It was a lovely place and would recommend it to families a d pet owners too ” • With a pet • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Nothing has it was perfectly 눇 Well the place was excellent and pet friendly too and the room we was in was excellent too nice and clean and comfortable as well as lovely staff too and the food was lovely a d we would recommend to other people has its a great place to stay especially if you have pets has there very welcome there too at the dalesway note thanks Lindsay Paul and Pedro May 30, 2017 Sandra United Kingdom Age group: 55 – 64 21 Reviews 10 “ Excellent as always ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 The property is central to all the amenities ilkley as to offer, the staff are very accommodating nothing too much trouble, the beer garden is a proper little sun trap even had a BBQ on this weekend May 22, 2017 Cherie United Kingdom 1 review 10 “ Best place to stay in Yorkshire ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The whole atmosphere and vibe of the place is wonderful 눇 This is a very friendly welcoming place proper home from home the staff cannot do enough for you and the rooms are beautiful May 10, 2017 Dave United Kingdom 1 review 10 “ Will return next year ” • Group • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Nothing to dislike 눇 Right near the venue for the Ilkley sportive. Staff were excellent morning and night. Another great part was that they offered us a full English breakfast and toast as an extra but very worth it. Karaoke on Sunday night was such a laugh at times and a great way to chill. Will definitely book again same time same event certainly same place. April 29, 2017 Louise United Kingdom 29 Reviews 8.3 “ Friendly and convenient local B and B above lively pub ” • Leisure trip • Group • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 2 nights 눉 May be a bit noisy if you wanted an early night - fortunately we didnt! 눇 Staff could not be more helpful, went out of their way to make us feel at home, particularly allowing us to have late drinks. Handy location April 23, 2017 Sharon United Kingdom 1 review 6.7 “ Basic stay ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The room wasn't what we expected tiny bathroom awkward to get into the room itself also very awkward to get in under a beam right above the door very basic for what we paid but understand that's because of the beautiful place it's situated in 눇 Central to where we wanted to be staff were fab and helpful very friendly had a good nyt when we got back to the pub very sociable April 18, 2017 Sandra United Kingdom Age group: 55 – 64 21 Reviews 10 “ Excellent ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 They seemed to have forgot we were in room 1 and we had to keep asking for extra milk and coffee, but apart from that everything perfect so perfect we've booked to go back in May. 눇 Lovely location everything central, the hotel lovely and clean, staff very helpful, food lovely had the carvery on Sunday very good value, stayed in room no1 right at the top of the building couldn't fault it and the views were lovely. April 10, 2017 Fay United Kingdom 3 Reviews 7.5 “ Good location to everything ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 No hash browns or black pudding on the breakfast & shower could have been warmer 눇 Lovely breakfast, with a cow milk jug!! Large room with walk in robe. March 28, 2017 Martin United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ Family friendly pub accomodation ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night 눉 Bathrooms could do with a bit of TLC 눇 Friendly and helpful staff did everything to help us have a pleasant stay (2 adults, 3 children and 1 grandma!), nice firm mattress, decent food January 18, 2017 Maria United Kingdom 2 Reviews 6.7 “ Warn about loud music until 2am ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 II thought I had booked a hotel that had a bar and restaurant so was very surprised to arrive at a pub with rooms above. I hoped for the best and assumed there would be good soundproofing between the bar and bedrooms but there was not. This was a problem as the music played very loudly until 2am - both nights - and it was almost 3am before the party people had vacated the disco and finished yelling their goodbyes to each other under my single-glazed window. I had to be up early each morning and had booked 2 night's stay so I could be refreshed and relaxed to attend the conference. The music was so loud it was impossible to sleep leaving me so tired the whole experience was spoiled, 눇 The staff at the Dalesway are friendly and the pub welcomes dogs. The location is excellent, and the room was fine with a comfortable bed. Staff agreed to serve me at 8.30 (breakfast serving due to start at 9am). I thought the arrangement was for both mornings but in the event it was only Saturday and I had to wait until the official start on Sunday. The breakfast was well cooked but choice was restricted. December 31, 2016 Douglas United Kingdom 2 Reviews 7.5 “ Conveniently located, good value for money hotel. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 No parking could have been more of a problem if the weather had been worse. 눇 Friendly staff and convenient location. Good breakfast. Would definitely stay there again, if in the area. December 29, 2016 Nigel United Kingdom 5 Reviews 8.3 “ Genuinely dog friendly and good beer! ” • With a pet • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Room was a little cold even with heating on full. On busy junction, but great for being in the heart of Ilkley. 눇 Very helpful and friendly staff. Genuinely dog friendly. Great breakfast. December 28, 2016 Jean United Kingdom 1 review 7.5 “ Great ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • 3 rooms • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Just music late on as above .but only me 눇 Everything couldn't fault it .only bit for me was music playing until 2am but rest of family ok enjoyed it December 18, 2016 David United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ Great location for Ilkley town staff brilliant ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Nothing 눇 Comfortable room and surrounding staff where great even poured a new Pint of Guinness us to a very small chip in the glass. We did say just poor it into another glass but he insisted on doing another one. Credit to him November 21, 2016 Diane United Kingdom 3 Reviews 8.3 “ Loved the location, the staff and the breakfast was really... ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night 눉 No hairdryer in the room. The noise from the bar but we were warned about it, small price to pay for the location 눇 Loved the location, the staff and the breakfast was really good November 5, 2016 Sultan Saudi Arabia Age group: 25 – 34 13 Reviews 9.6 “ Very good hotel with friendly staff ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 4 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 I think he Internet coverage and spead could be better. 눇 Very good location,food,service and good value for money. I was very about the hotel. If I come back in future to the same town, I will definitely back here. October 28, 2016 Joanne United Kingdom 3 Reviews 7.1 “ Good value hotel in central location. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Carpet didn't look as if it had been hoovered since last guests as bits all over. Shower very complicated and mouldy inside. 눇 Nicely furnished room with comfy bed and decent pillows. Good breakfast but being OFFERED cereal instead of it just saying on the menu that it was AVAILABLE would have been better. No fruit juice on offer either. October 24, 2016 Clive United Kingdom 4 Reviews 3.8 “ Beautiful Ilkey spoiler ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 The twin room was cramp, tired looking and looked dark and unclean,it smelt of dog. The bathroom was tired looking and clean but the smell of the drainage was quite overwhelming. The toilet flush actually sounded like 'the Isle of Man Ferry fog horn' The beds was shabby with old bed linen which had pulls and snags in the duvet cover. The sheets where winter white. The bed mattress was stained and smelled old. The electric socket by the bed became warm after the lamp was switched on for 10minutes. we felt it was unsafe so only had the main electric light on. We were unable to actually complain on the day as we were under time pressure because we were attending a wedding. We left the wedding earlier than planned in order to leave the hotel and go home that night, so strong was our concern about the room. I was unable to actually speak with the Landlord that evening as he was unavailable. Today I have spoken with the Landlord and have expressed my concerns. He has in fact offered use a return trip to Ilkley at his expense but it is an area of the country we do not visit, and so we have turned down his kind gesture. He also assures me that he will personally look into our concerns. 눇 The location October 24, 2016 Kitty United Kingdom 1 review 8.8 “ Very comfortable, spacious and clean. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night 눉 Would have been a little nicer if breakfast was included in the price and if check out was at 11am. 눇 Very comfortable, spacious and clean. Great central Ilkley location. I really loved the gorgeous black Labrador that was hanging around October 14, 2016 Gabriel Australia 23 Reviews 9.6 “ Great value ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Superior Double Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 No stairs would be good but you can't have everything 눇 Staff very friendly and helpful; location could not be better; large room; good wifi; very comfortable bed October 3, 2016 Kerry United Kingdom 2 Reviews 10 “ Super stay at the Dalesway Hotel ” • With a pet • Solo traveler • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night 눇 The staff went out of their way to make me something vegetarian and gluten-free for breakfast! The room was spacious and the bed was very comfortable for my one night stay. I would have no hesitation booking a room at this lovely venue again. September 22, 2016 Linda United Kingdom 1 review 7.1 “ Good location v Poor location ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Woken up by noise outside early morning because of the lack of double glazing which is no fault of the hotel sadly it is because of the location. Good location for the day bad for night time. No one available to book out in the morning although we were told it was because they "allow for a lie in on a sunday". We would stay again though 눇 Great location. Clean. September 8, 2016 Tom United Kingdom 2 Reviews 6.7 “ Perfectly adequate for my minimal needs but the lack of breakfast was disappointing ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 Two main issues - it is a pub with rooms and there is a strong smell of cooking oil on the stairs, but didn't notice it in the room fortunately. I didn't get my breakfast as the staff didn't turn up 눇 The bedroom was clean and the bed comfortable. I had very little interaction with staff so can't really comment. I couldn't use the Wi-Fi because of a problem with my laptop so can't comment on facilities but there was working TV and coffee facilities in the room September 6, 2016 Victoria United Kingdom 4 Reviews 5.8 “ Nice location and decent room - shame about the noisy bar ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Unfortunately despite asking for a room away from the bar, we couldn't have been closer to it! I assume it's because they were otherwise full but it would have been nice to have been told. We could hear every word of every song on the bar until 2am. Plus the power was off briefly so we couldn't dry our wet clothes on the towel rack. 눇 Bed was comfortable and good sized room and tv August 30, 2016 Pamela United Kingdom 6 Reviews 5.8 “ Not value for money ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Superior Double Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 The hotel was quite old and in need of TLC, paintwork and wood rotting. The bathroom, and shower were in a poor state. Breakfast was quite nice, but no cereal or fruit juice, just the bare essentials and was not included in the price. 눇 The location was excellent right in the heart of the town. Staff were polite and friendly. August 7, 2016 Adrian United Kingdom 2 Reviews 9.2 “ Excellent in most aspects. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Very noisy electric ventilator in the bathroom that came on with the light. Not enough shelf space in the bathroom. Daily service could have vaccuumed more and washed the cups. Unclear guidance about parking. Was good once explained where spaces were nearby, but nowhere to stop by the hotel on arrival. 눇 Large and airy room. Easy chair and sofa. Good view. Best location for the town, the Dales, and Leeds by train. Didn't have the breakfast or eat there because an excellent choice of cafés and restaurants nearby. August 2, 2016 Michelle United Kingdom 5 Reviews 5.4 “ Very noisy until 3am in the morning ” • With a pet • Leisure trip • Couple • Superior Double Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 It is a pub on the corner of a busy road. Could here the noise from the bar downstairs and drinkers were gathered below our window and very noisy until about 3am in the morning so we got very little sleep. 눇 Large room and the food was really good. July 27, 2016 Ian United Kingdom 1 review 6.3 “ Disappointing overall. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The noise from Pub below was ridiculous and went on well into the night. The bedroom windows were severely in need of a coat of paint and did not close properly. The curtains were practically see through, the duvet barely covered the bed and the bottom of the shower, which was tepid to say the least, was quite dirty. 눇 The breakfast was excellent July 26, 2016 Gordon United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ A value for money hotel. ” • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Rooms basic. Food average. 눇 Location is very good. Breakfast is very good. Adequate car parking across the road Good beer. Alfie the dog is the star Staff very pleasant and helpful. July 24, 2016 Kirstie United Kingdom 2 Reviews 9.6 “ It's quite noisey as it's above a pub. ” • Leisure trip • Family with older children • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 It's quite noisey as it's above a pub. I never realised that when booking however the staff were lovely they allowed us to have a take away as we arrived late plus drinks from the bar which they added to the room bill would recommend July 10, 2016 Claire United Kingdom 1 review 9.6 “ Really enjoyed my stay ...the place was spotless and the bed was extremely comfy ...would recommend ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Didn't get a welcome pack with details on breakfast and WiFi password but everything else was fine 눇 The guys who run the place are welcoming...as a lady on my own I felt very safe...the breakfast was fab June 21, 2016 Gillian United Kingdom 2 Reviews 5.5 “ Good location, freindly staff, good food, rooms ok.....thought £95.00 was a bit steep. ” • Leisure trip • Group • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night 눉 rooms were in need of a spruce, but clean. We requested an early check in but even though we ended up not arriving until 2pm the rooms weren't ready. The bar was very noisy until 3am....so not a very good nights sleep. 눇 Comfy beds, good food, very helpful staff. June 20, 2016 Louise United Kingdom 5 Reviews 8.3 “ Overnight in Ilkley ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눇 Ideally situated for our overnight stay in Ilkley. The staff were very attentive and friendly. The room was large and comfortable with a great shower! June 14, 2016 Judith United Kingdom 13 Reviews 6.7 “ Breakfast was good. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Shower broke. 1 bed was comfy, 1 squeaked at every turn. They seemed to have forgotten we had ordered breakfast for 8.30am and didn't appear until 9.00am. 눇 Breakfast was good. Position of hotel was good. Staff were very pleasant. June 5, 2016 Julia United Kingdom 1 review 7.9 “ Great place for town centre stay ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Difficult to park & had to let myself out at 8am via outdoor smoking area, ashtrays still full from previous night. 눇 Staff very helpful. Nice old building, good central location June 5, 2016 Barbara United Kingdom 3 Reviews 8.8 “ Excellent place to stay when visiting The Grand Ilkley ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 We came on a night when there was a DJ and a disco. When we came back from the concert at The Grand we would have liked to have had a chat with friends. It was too loud to do so. This disco only happens once a month so it was just unfortunate timing 눇 The staff were very friendly and helpful and did warn us about the disco. Great breakfast for just £5 each June 3, 2016 Andy United Kingdom 2 Reviews 6.7 “ Convenient location but noisy bar till late ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 Breakfast not included within the room rate. We stayed on the Saturday night and music was on till about 2.20am. Read that first floor may experience noise to 2am but thought it wouldn't be as loud on the second floor. 눇 Convenient location in the centre of Ilkley June 2, 2016 Lindsey United Kingdom 2 Reviews 8.3 “ Central and a great breakfast to start the day ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Can't think of anything that we didn't particularly like. Couldn't work the shower but that's probably because it was modern and we didn't know what we were doing. 눇 Hotel was central and managed to park across the road for free. Breakfast was extremely delicious. May 22, 2016 David United Kingdom 1 review 8.8 “ Value for money, a warm welcome and helpful staff. ” • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night 눉 perhaps a cupboard/storage shelves in the bathroom. Another comfy chair in the bedroom. 눇 excellent breakfast, lovely staff & a comfortable stay. May 3, 2016 Ij United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ Great stay ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Triple Room with Shower • Stayed 2 nights 눇 Staff were very friendly and attentive. Great food and perfect location. Ilkley Station was only a 5 minute walk from the hotel. Was told that it could be noising in the night due to the music in the bar but nothing unbearable. Would visit again! April 27, 2016 Ian United Kingdom 3 Reviews 8.8 “ Great value and location ” • With a pet • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The shower could have been better. Some noise from the bar but we had been warned to expect this 눇 The landlord and his staff could not have been any more accommodating - food was very good and excellent value April 26, 2016 Ian United Kingdom 1 review 5.8 “ Staff were obliging ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 3 nights 눉 Limited breakfast options. No evening meals on Sundays Noisy in hotel until late night. Television did not work properly 눇 Staff were obliging Meals were good value Central location March 27, 2016 Jan United Kingdom 4 Reviews 8.3 “ Good position for the shops, friendly staff ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 We were on the second floor which wasn't double glazed so it was noisy. It is a pub & there was a DJ until 2am so you could hear the music. Quieter on the floor above. The landlord did offer us a room on that floor when one because available but we were only there one night & so tired we slept through it. 눇 The Staff couldn't have been more friendly or helpful. The cooked breakfast was fantastic March 27, 2016 John United Kingdom 11 Reviews 9.6 “ Short Break ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Deluxe Double Room with Shower • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Nothing 눇 Central location very handy for walks, nice size room with wifi. Lovely breakfast available we had an evening meal on the first night the portions were more than generous and was very tasty. Look out for Alfie a very friendly black labrador who like a tickle behind the ears. March 22, 2016 Catherine United Kingdom 7 Reviews 8.3 “ 3rd Stay, but possibly our last due to the noise from late night patrons of the bar, sorry. ” • Business trip • Couple • Superior Double Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The room hadn't been hovered and the noise from the smoking area at the front of the hotel was very disruptive to our sleep, not good when we had an early start. 눇 The bed was really comfy and the staff are friendly and helpful. The views are great and location ideal. February 9, 2016 Christine United Kingdom 1 review 6.7 “ Not what was advertised ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Not being able to eat in the hotel 눇 Website stated meals served, no food available. When we asked the staff they said no food served and directed us to alternate places. I have emailed the hotel directly and awaiting a reply December 17, 2015 Anonymous Jersey 4 Reviews 5.8 “ Handy place if Crescent Hotel full ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Penthouse Double Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Heater in room was fine & it was a large room ( needed hoovering!) but the bed so cold it felt damp & I slept in my clothes. Prefer you do not print this !! 눇 It was situated where I wanted to be November 25, 2015 Jenny United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ Lovely staff, perfect location ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The decor in the hotel was a little tired but this was acceptable for the price paid 눇 Great staff, really friendly and helpful. I would recommend if you want a cheap but nice place to stay! November 14, 2017 Jade United Kingdom 1 review 8.8 “ The staff were lovely and extremily welcoming. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 The staff were lovely and extremily welcoming. Perfect for a 1 night stay if your in ilkley for the night. November 13, 2017 Keith United Kingdom 3 Reviews 6.3 “ Great location right in the centre of town ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night 눇 Great location right in the centre of town November 6, 2017 Christine United Kingdom 5 Reviews 7.9 “ Sufficient for our purpose ” • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Nothing did not like. It was comfortable pub room. Breakfast ( not included ) was good n reasonable. 눇 Was central Ilkley November 2, 2017 Ian United Kingdom 1 review 6.7 “ We enjoyed our stay likely is a lovely place and our hotel was satisfied with our room for what we p ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Twin with Bathroom/Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Not a complaining person but had to mention the annoying whistle all night in the secondary double glazing told staff hope is fixed for next guests October 30, 2017 Steve United Kingdom Age group: 45 – 54 10 Reviews 8.8 “ Good value ” • Leisure trip • Group • 2 rooms • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 Good location but no parking in site. Spacious room and friendly staff October 26, 2017 Lorraine United Kingdom 2 Reviews 10 “ Everything was just what we needed. We were made to feel very welcome. Would like to say thank you ! ” • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 Staff and management were very helpful and friendly. October 22, 2017 Anonymous United Kingdom 4 Reviews 9.6 “ Enjoyed it ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The toilet made a noise after flush 눇 The breakfast was good October 13, 2017 Mick United Kingdom 1 review 8.3 “ Very enjoyable will stay again when we visit box tree restaurant. ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double Room with Shower • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Never experienced anything that didn't, like . 눇 Room very comfy , bar area nice good drink and good food menu . digest: Read 287 verified reviews from real guests of Dalesway Hotel in Ilkley, rated 8 out of 10 by Booking.com guests.
title: 287 Verified Hotel Reviews of Dalesway Hotel | Booking.com
